verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, set thy face against Gog, the land of Magog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal, and prophesy against him,
verses.web: “Son of man, set your face toward Gog, of the land of Magog, the prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal, and prophesy against him,
verses.ct: "Son of man, turn your face toward Gog, of the land of Magog — the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal — and prophesy against him.

verses.kjv: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal:
verses.web: and say, ‘The Lord LORD says: “Behold, I am against you, Gog, prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal.
verses.ct: Say to him, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: I am against you, Gog, chief prince of Meshech and Tubal.

verses.kjv: And I will turn thee back, and put hooks into thy jaws, and I will bring thee forth, and all thine army, horses and horsemen, all of them clothed with all sorts of armour, even a great company with bucklers and shields, all of them handling swords:
verses.web: I will turn you around, and put hooks into your jaws, and I will bring you out, with all your army, horses and horsemen, all of them clothed in full armor, a great company with buckler and shield, all of them handling swords;
verses.ct: I will turn you around and put hooks in your jaws. I will drag you out along with your entire army — horses and riders, all of them dressed in full armor — a massive force armed with shields, bucklers, and swords.

verses.kjv: Persia, Ethiopia, and Libya with them; all of them with shield and helmet:
verses.web: Persia, Cush, and Put with them, all of them with shield and helmet;
verses.ct: Persia, Ethiopia, and Libya will march with them, all carrying shields and wearing helmets.

verses.kjv: Gomer, and all his bands; the house of Togarmah of the north quarters, and all his bands: and many people with thee.
verses.web: Gomer, and all his hordes; the house of Togarmah in the uttermost parts of the north, and all his hordes; even many peoples with you.
verses.ct: Gomer and all its troops will join you, along with the house of Togarmah from the far north and all its forces — a vast alliance of many nations at your side.

verses.kjv: Be thou prepared, and prepare for thyself, thou, and all thy company that are assembled unto thee, and be thou a guard unto them.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Be prepared, yes, prepare yourself, you, and all your companies who are assembled to you, and be a guard to them.
verses.ct: Get ready. Prepare yourself — you and all the armies gathered around you — and take command of them.

verses.kjv: After many days thou shalt be visited: in the latter years thou shalt come into the land that is brought back from the sword, and is gathered out of many people, against the mountains of Israel, which have been always waste: but it is brought forth out of the nations, and they shall dwell safely all of them.
verses.web: After many days you will be visited. In the latter years you will come into the land that is brought back from the sword, that is gathered out of many peoples, on the mountains of Israel, which have been a continual waste; but it is brought out of the peoples, and they will dwell securely, all of them.
verses.ct: After a long time, you will be called into action. In the final years, you will invade a land that has recovered from war, whose people have been gathered from many nations back to the mountains of Israel — mountains that had been left desolate for ages. These people will have been brought home from among the nations, and all of them will be living in safety.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt ascend and come like a storm, thou shalt be like a cloud to cover the land, thou, and all thy bands, and many people with thee.
verses.web: You will ascend. You will come like a storm. You will be like a cloud to cover the land, you, and all your hordes, and many peoples with you.”
verses.ct: You will advance like a storm rolling in. You and all your troops, along with many nations beside you, will sweep over the land like a cloud."

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; It shall also come to pass, that at the same time shall things come into thy mind, and thou shalt think an evil thought:
verses.web: “ ‘The Lord LORD says: “It will happen in that day that things will come into your mind, and you will devise an evil plan.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: "On that day, dark thoughts will enter your mind, and you will hatch an evil plan.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt say, I will go up to the land of unwalled villages; I will go to them that are at rest, that dwell safely, all of them dwelling without walls, and having neither bars nor gates,
verses.web: You will say, ‘I will go up to the land of unwalled villages. I will go to those who are at rest, who dwell securely, all of them dwelling without walls, and having neither bars nor gates,
verses.ct: You will say to yourself, 'I will march against a land of unprotected villages. I will attack people who are living peacefully and securely — people whose towns have no walls, no gates, and no bars to lock.

verses.kjv: To take a spoil, and to take a prey; to turn thine hand upon the desolate places that are now inhabited, and upon the people that are gathered out of the nations, which have gotten cattle and goods, that dwell in the midst of the land.
verses.web: to take the plunder and to take prey; to turn your hand against the waste places that are inhabited, and against the people who are gathered out of the nations, who have gotten livestock and goods, who dwell in the middle of the earth.’
verses.ct: I will plunder and loot them. I will strike the once-ruined places that are now filled with people — people gathered back from the nations, who have built up herds and wealth and are living at the center of the land.'

verses.kjv: Sheba, and Dedan, and the merchants of Tarshish, with all the young lions thereof, shall say unto thee, Art thou come to take a spoil? hast thou gathered thy company to take a prey? to carry away silver and gold, to take away cattle and goods, to take a great spoil?
verses.web: Sheba, and Dedan, and the merchants of Tarshish, with all the young lions of it, will ask you, ‘Have you come to take the plunder? Have you assembled your company to take the prey, to carry away silver and gold, to take away livestock and goods, to take great plunder?’ ” ’
verses.ct: Sheba, Dedan, and the merchants of Tarshish, along with all their allies, will challenge you: 'Have you come to plunder? Have you assembled your armies to haul off silver and gold, to seize livestock and goods, to carry away a massive load of loot?'"

verses.kjv: Therefore, son of man, prophesy and say unto Gog, Thus saith the Lord GOD; In that day when my people of Israel dwelleth safely, shalt thou not know it?
verses.web: “Therefore, son of man, prophesy, and tell Gog, ‘The Lord LORD says: “In that day when my people Israel dwells securely, will you not know it?
verses.ct: "So prophesy, son of man, and say to Gog, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: When my people Israel are living securely, you will certainly take notice.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt come from thy place out of the north parts, thou, and many people with thee, all of them riding upon horses, a great company, and a mighty army:
verses.web: You will come from your place out of the uttermost parts of the north, you, and many peoples with you, all of them riding on horses, a great company and a mighty army.
verses.ct: You will come from your homeland in the far north — you and many nations with you — all of them mounted on horses, a massive and powerful army.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt come up against my people of Israel, as a cloud to cover the land; it shall be in the latter days, and I will bring thee against my land, that the heathen may know me, when I shall be sanctified in thee, O Gog, before their eyes.
verses.web: You will come up against my people Israel, as a cloud to cover the land. It will happen in the latter days, that I will bring you against my land, that the nations may know me, when I am sanctified in you, Gog, before their eyes.”
verses.ct: You will advance against my people Israel like a cloud covering the land. In the final days, I myself will bring you against my land so that the nations will know me when I display my holiness through what I do to you, Gog, right before their eyes."

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Art thou he of whom I have spoken in old time by my servants the prophets of Israel, which prophesied in those days many years that I would bring thee against them?
verses.web: “ ‘The Lord LORD says: “Are you he of whom I spoke in old time by my servants the prophets of Israel, who prophesied in those days for years that I would bring you against them?
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: "You are the one I spoke about long ago through my servants the prophets of Israel. For years they prophesied that I would bring you against my people.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass at the same time when Gog shall come against the land of Israel, saith the Lord GOD, that my fury shall come up in my face.
verses.web: It will happen in that day, when Gog comes against the land of Israel,” says the Lord LORD, “that my wrath will come up into my nostrils.
verses.ct: But on the day Gog invades the land of Israel," declares the Lord GOD, "my burning fury will rise up.

verses.kjv: For in my jealousy and in the fire of my wrath have I spoken, Surely in that day there shall be a great shaking in the land of Israel;
verses.web: For in my jealousy and in the fire of my wrath I have spoken. Surely in that day there will be a great shaking in the land of Israel;
verses.ct: In my jealousy and blazing wrath I declare that on that day a violent earthquake will shake the land of Israel.

verses.kjv: So that the fishes of the sea, and the fowls of the heaven, and the beasts of the field, and all creeping things that creep upon the earth, and all the men that are upon the face of the earth, shall shake at my presence, and the mountains shall be thrown down, and the steep places shall fall, and every wall shall fall to the ground.
verses.web: so that the fish of the sea, the birds of the sky, the animals of the field, all creeping things who creep on the earth, and all the men who are on the surface of the earth will shake at my presence. Then the mountains will be thrown down, the steep places will fall, and every wall will fall to the ground.
verses.ct: The fish in the sea, the birds in the sky, the animals in the field, every creature that crawls on the ground, and every person on the face of the earth will tremble at my presence. Mountains will be thrown down, cliffs will crumble, and every wall will collapse to the ground.

verses.kjv: And I will call for a sword against him throughout all my mountains, saith the Lord GOD: every man’s sword shall be against his brother.
verses.web: I will call for a sword against him to all my mountains,” says the Lord LORD. “Every man’s sword will be against his brother.
verses.ct: I will summon a sword against Gog across all my mountains," declares the Lord GOD. "Every soldier will turn his sword against his own comrade.

verses.kjv: And I will plead against him with pestilence and with blood; and I will rain upon him, and upon his bands, and upon the many people that are with him, an overflowing rain, and great hailstones, fire, and brimstone.
verses.web: I will enter into judgment with him with pestilence and with blood. I will rain on him, and on his hordes, and on the many peoples who are with him, an overflowing shower, with great hailstones, fire, and sulfur.
verses.ct: I will judge him with plague and bloodshed. I will pour down torrential rain, massive hailstones, fire, and burning sulfur on him, on his troops, and on the many nations fighting alongside him.

verses.kjv: Thus will I magnify myself, and sanctify myself; and I will be known in the eyes of many nations, and they shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: I will magnify myself, and sanctify myself, and I will make myself known in the eyes of many nations. Then they will know that I am LORD.” ’
verses.ct: In this way I will display my greatness and my holiness. I will make myself known before the eyes of many nations, and they will know that I am the LORD.'"
